properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CA_NO , BK_NO_OR , MEM_NO_OR , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT CA_NO , BK_NO_OR , MEM_NO_OR , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , STATUS , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO_OR = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO_OR = ?
INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CA_NO , BK_NO_OR , MEM_NO_OR , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
